title: 1963년 In re Chocko 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: In re Chocko. 판결일: 1963-04-22. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: In the Matter of Feliksa Chocko, as Administratrix of the Estate of John Chocko, Motor Vehicle Accident Indemnification Corporation
**판결일**: 1963-04-22
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 18 A.D.2d 1106

## 판결문 요약


Motion by appellant to vacate order of this court entered December 26, 1962 {ante, p. 713), dismissing the appeal. Motion granted; order vacated; appeal ordered on the calendar for the September Term, beginning September 9, 1963. The record and appellant’s brief must be served and filed on or before June 14, 1963. Beldock, P. J., Christ, Brennan, Hill and Rabin, JJ., concur.
...
